document.full_text: jacoby ellsbury and carl crawford homered in a five-run third inning to help the boston red sox beat the detroit tigers 6-3 on friday night.
document.title: ellsbury, crawford homer as red sox beat tigers
lines_and_colors: jacoby ellsbury and carl crawford homered in a five-run third inning to help the boston red sox beat the detroit tigers 6-3 on friday night.
